QuestData.Title: The Crone's Bargain
QuestData.Description: Yes, it must be the little green prisoner you're after... We might be able to help each other.$B$BYou're not going to get the goblin out of here by force. Not alive, anyway.$B$BAmong my people I am known as a Yrkvinn, a practitioner of illusions. As you can see, the Hyldnir have made me their prisoner.$B$BIf I had my runes, I could make you go unnoticed among them. Further inside, patrolling the mines, you'll find an overseer named Syra. She has my runes. Retrieve them and we'll talk some more.
QuestData.LogDescription: Lok'lira the Crone inside the Forlorn Mine wants you to retrieve the Runes of the Yrkvinn from Overseer Syra.
QuestData.CompletionText: My runes, $n? Do you have them?
QuestData.RewardText: I wasn't sure you were coming back. I dread to think what will happen to me if I stay here for much longer.
